Title: Full Boyle
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Norm Hiscock, Gil Ozeri (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake tries to keep Charles from going "full Boyle" on his new girlfriend. Meanwhile, Rosa and Amy are reluctant to help an amateur caped crime fighter, and Holt faces competition for the presidency of a police organization he founded.
